description: Xojo projects can be saved in three different formats: Project (text), Binary , and XML . If you do not have a product license, you will only be able to save your project in the binary format ( .XOJO_BINARY_PROJECT ), which is similar to the old Real Studio binary format.
To create the XOJO_PROJECT file, select File → New Project... , name the application, click "OK." After you create the project, select File → Save As... , choose the save location, and click Save .
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.
